mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, PROPERTYVALUE.PROPNAME as property_name, PROPERTYVALUE.PROPVAL_TAGID as property_tagid, COMMANDVALUE.CMDNAME as command_name, COMMANDVALUE.CMDVAL_TAGID as command_tagid FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN PROPERTYVALUE ON DEVICE.DEVID = PROPERTYVALUE.DEVID INNER JOIN COMMANDVALUE ON DEVICE.DEVID = COMMANDVALUE.DEVID

SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, PROPERTYVALUE.PROPNAME as property_name, PROPERTYVALUE.PROPVAL_TAGID as property_tagid, COMMANDVALUE.CMDNAME as command_name, COMMANDVALUE.CMDVAL_TAGID as command_tagid FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN PROPERTYVALUE ON DEVICE.DEVID = PROPERTYVALUE.DEVID INNER JOIN COMMANDVALUE ON DEVICE.DEVID = COMMANDVALUE.DEVID WHERE DEVICE.DEVID = #{id}
